entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Authorize attribute with AllowAnonymous attribute always anonymous. #43550
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43549
  • Quarantine Http3.Http3TlsTests.OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #43548
  • TryParse parameter binding breaks if IParsable is explicitly implemented #43546
  • EndpointBuilder.ApplicationServices should use `init` instead of `set` #43544
    7.0-rc2
  • When I install the ASP Core as windows service I can't connect to my gRPC service #43547
  • Blazor: get currently focused element #43541
  • Hot reload no longer works in dotnet CLI #43540
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #43538

Closed

  • Blazor Server SPA is returning 'Soft 404' error while accessing an URL/page directly from SEO crawler #43075
  • Uncatchable Exception While Using IFormFile Object Streams #43424
  • Requests using the absolute-form in the request line require the host to match #39335
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Feature] Blazor QuickGrid add the ability to be able to export all data or filtered data to a pdf , csv, html #43499
  • Can't build docker image for ASP.NET Core + React #43514
  • How to host an ASP Core .NET 6 application in a windows service? #43527
  • Reload Blazor UI #43370
  • Blazor Server - NotAuthorized content is shown before Authorization is finished #43492
  • Blazor WASM web app doesn't work properly in Firefox #43516

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sdk with arcade 10585 #43555
  • [release/6.0] Remove Windows.10.Amd64.Server20H2.Open #43554
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Skip output caching for keys with delimiters #43553
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr
  • [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43545
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    7.0-rc2
  • Add pointerenter/leave to nonBubblingEvents #43542
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_Allow_NotAvailable_Optional #43537
    area-runtime
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_Required_NotSent_AcceptedViaCallback #43536
    area-runtime
  • Unquarantine WebHostTests.UseUrls_HelloWorld_ClientSuccess #43535
    area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43534
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43533
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #43551
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] HTTP/3 flaky test retries and logging #43423
    area-runtime
  • Remove the double dispatch on Windows for IO #43449
    area-runtime
  • Move to -Svc pool provider (release/7.0) #43529
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Make skipComponentGovernanceDetection a variable #43477
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #43521
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [Blazor] Fix linking issues #43515
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1967103 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Fix redirect to login #43520
    area-mvc
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box #43232
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43518
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 7.0-rc2
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
